services.label: OUR SERVICES
services.title: WHAT WE CAN DO FOR YOU

proyectos-obras.title: Project & Construction Management
proyectos-obras.shortDesc: Concrete solutions to maximize opportunities in new construction, optimizing use, rent, and costs.
desc: The objective of this service is to provide a concrete solution to the Client's requirements when it comes to maximizing opportunities in new construction projects. We take care of the entire project lifecycle, from conception to final delivery.
Our comprehensive approach ensures that every technical and financial decision aligns with the client's business objectives.
benefits: Maximization of space use and profitability.
Analysis of alternatives and opportunity costs.
Tight supervision of quality and deadlines.

administracion.title: Administration
administracion.shortDesc: Maximizing the quality/value ratio with comprehensive management of suppliers, contracts, and insurance.
desc: This service is oriented towards maximizing the ratio between service quality and value, taking care to keep prices at a minimum level, consistent with the service quality the Client wishes to receive.
The service is habitually accompanied by annual budgets and monthly administrative and operational management reports, so the Client is always informed of the general situation of their properties.
benefits: Careful selection and management of suppliers.
Active administration of contracts and leases.
Management of insurance and operational risks.
Operational alignment between suppliers and client.

consultoria.title: Real Estate Consulting
consultoria.shortDesc: Comprehensive advice for the management, purchase, lease, and valuation of real estate assets.
desc: Having problems with property management? Need an integrating tool? Not sure whether to buy or lease a property? We seek to provide you with the necessary clarity to make informed decisions.
From the traditional market scheme and approach to the most innovative work/incentive proposals to represent you exclusively, whose advantages and benefits repay our fees by themselves.
We have been in the real estate business for over 30 years: consult us. We can help you.
benefits: Precise valuation of real estate assets.

items.question: What type of Clients work with Procuratio?
items.answer: Our Clients belong to diverse industries: industrial, mining, construction, financial, and educational. Our services are designed almost exclusively for Companies and/or Corporations.

items.question: What does B2B Non-Core Services mean?
items.answer: They are services exclusively oriented to Companies, designed to support those areas that are not own or central to the main business of our Clients.

items.question: Do you have a delivery standard?
items.answer: Our services are made to measure. We define with each Client the standards of response, quality, quantity, and delivery times according to their specific needs.

items.question: Can you provide all services simultaneously?
items.answer: Yes, we can. We were born as an integrator of non-core services and all of them are integrated into our administration management.
